summary: There will be no other end to the world: fierce battles full of hatred and love for incest and wealth.
cast: Udo Kier|Tilda Swinton|Uwe Fellensiek|Anna Fechter|Anastasia Kudelka|Sergej Gleitmann|Dietrich Kuhlbrodt|Wolfgang Schulte|Ark Boysen|Melf Boysen|Werner Funke
title: Egomania - Insel ohne Hoffnung
